post.content:
Dear Band Families

Here are some Picture Day reminders.  Please be aware that reminders will not usually be sent and that you should frequently check Mr. Vitale’s website (www.northroyaltonhighschoolband.com) for information on events.  Check the Performances page of his website for the itineraries/maps/details for performances.  The Director’s Notes page of the website also has valuable information. 

Picture Day Reminders

7:00 AM Report 

7:15 AM at Stadium

Students need to be in full uniform:

  • Black marching Band Shoes
  • Black calflength black Socks
  • The nonNR black marching pants
  • White band TShirt under the Jacket
  • Band uniform Jacket
  • Black Gloves
  • Hair according to uniform code (see band handbook for details)
  • Earrings according to uniform code (see band handbook for details)
  • Hats are not needed for picture day
  • Students are dismissed once they have completed ALL the pictures, which takes a while
  • Picture order forms should be given directly to the photographer do NOT give picture order forms to Mr. Vitale or the Band Mailbox
  • Parents can place photo button orders through the Band Boosters not through Woodard/Lifetouch

***AS THE SCHOOL YEAR BEGINS, PARENTS ARE ENCOURAGED TO VISIT THE BAND WEBPAGE (www.northroyaltonhighschoolband.com) FOR UPDATES ABOUT PERFORMANCES, ITINERARIES, MAPS, DETAILS, ETC. AS THEIR SOURCE FOR UPTODATE INFORMATION***
